text: Quigley Down Under is a 1990 Australian-American western movie directed by Simon Wincer and starring Tom Selleck, Alan Rickman, Laura San Giacomo, Chris Haywood, Ron Haddrick, Tony Bonner, Jerome Ehlers, Roger Ward. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1990 movies Category:1990s Western (genre) movies Category:Australian Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Simon Wincer Category:Movies set in Australia Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies about indigenous peoples
title: Quigley Down Under
